instruction: How can you explain recent advances in AI technology?
output: Recent advances in AI technology can largely be attributed to improvements in computing power, the growth of large-scale data sets and the development of better algorithms. These improvements have allowed computers to improve their understanding of images, speech and text, as well as their ability to make decisions with minimal human intervention. Additionally, there has been increased interest and research into AI, leading to the development of smarter AI models with more powerful capabilities.
